/* eslint-disable */
import { decodeMorse } from './decodeMorse.js';

const testData = {
  test1: {
    str: '00101010100000000010001011101000101110100000111111**********00001011110000111111000010111000101110100000111010',
    expectedStr: 'hello world',
  },

  test2: {
    str: '000000001100101010100000000010**********00111110110000101011000000101000111011100000111011**********00111010100000101110000011111100001011110000001110**********001010111000001111110011101011**********00101111110000101011000000111100101111100000101010**********0000111111001010101100000000100000101110**********000000001100101010100000000010**********0010111010000000101100111110100011101111**********000011101000001111110000111110',
    expectedStr: 'the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog',
  },

  test3: {
    str: '0000101010000011111100000011110000000010000011111100000011100000000010**********00001011100000000010000000101100001110100000101010**********0000000011001010101000000010100000101010',
    expectedStr: 'someone reads this',
  },

  test4: {
    str: '',
    expectedStr: 'd3ca775829b4b8c0e59620017bf2596b27d0c5cd3de8eac0a145c4f25b31a63e2ebf340c4335a826c443ecea6069f50a836fdc35cc6c2a94cdf5da0fb3b6acb',
  },

  test5: {
    str: '10111111111111101010001110101000101011101010111111101010101011111111101110101010',
    expectedStr: '17bf2596',
  },
};

describe('decodeMorse', () => {
  test('Unit test1', () => {
    const test1 = testData.test1;
    const str = decodeMorse(test1.str);
    expect(str).toEqual(test1.expectedStr);
  });

  test('Unit test2', () => {
    const test2 = testData.test2;
    const str = decodeMorse(test2.str);
    expect(str).toEqual(test2.expectedStr);
  });

  test('Unit test3', () => {
    const test3 = testData.test3;
    const str = decodeMorse(test3.str);
    expect(str).toEqual(test3.expectedStr);
  });

  test('Unit test4', () => {
    const test4 = testData.test4;
    const str = decodeMorse(test4.str);
    expect(str).toEqual(test4.expectedStr);
  });

  test('Unit test5', () => {
    const test5 = testData.test5;
    const str = decodeMorse(test5.str);
    expect(str).toEqual(test5.expectedStr);
  });
});
